title: i cant get into league ive been trying for hours pls help ;-;
body:
So about a day ago my league began having problems

the problem was whenever i got into a games loading screen it wouldn't even show up and would say your not connected (even though i was) I've tried fixes and i reinstalled league along with resetting my router to factory settings but nothings working i now have 5 20 minute bans from trying to get my league to work anything would help thanks.

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be encountering connection issues. Can you give this a shot:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
